attributes.action: Ban jackpot gaming machines from licensed betting offices
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These jackpot machines are highly addictive, there is limits to the amount you can win but there is no limit on the amount you can lose. Increasing numbers of people who can ill afford to lose are playing these machines, people from all backgrounds have become addicted as a result there is a lot of hardship.
